title: For Sale:  Hammerli (SIG) 212
location: Far NE IL, Illinois, United States
postcontent:
Your choice of Hammerli (SIG) 212 pistols. 

Detailed downloadable images available.  Please send email request.  The number available is declining, with only one remaining available.

These 10rd .22lr guns offer supreme accuracy, far better than what the S&W 41 or Hi Standard Victor can provide.  They are useful for target shooting, as well as self defense or "concealed carry".  In Europe, they are favored for security and intelligence work, where precision and zero "collateral damage" or unintended victims are desired.  In addition to an ideal target gun, they are optimal for defensive use inside buildings where wall penetration and high people density will be problems.

The 212 is the ultimate S&W 41, that S&W never made.

The rear sight is adjustable for windage only.  The front weight is removable.

The trigger system on these guns is taken from the Hammerli 215, a later version with a number of "user" adjustments not present on the older 208 and original 212 models.

Price varies from $1000 to $1600 with one magazine (additional are available) depending on the configuration of grip, gun, and barrel weight chosen.  The different grips and barrel weights shown can be interchanged between guns.  

All are single action.  A scope rail (aftermarket) can be fitted to the weight area of the barrel for bullseye use.

Please note, the MIDDLE gun has NO safety, and NO trigger stop.  For most uses, neither feature adds or subtracts from the function of the gun.  The trigger stop primarily is of use when firing rate exceeds 2 per second, as the trigger has a very short stroke distance anyway.  The middle gun also has a concealed crack in the grip.  NIB grips can be provided to replace that, one is a slab grip that is unstained, and one is a Nill grip fully finished with thumb rest.  The grip on it is OEM Hammerli but the left side has been extensively fish-scaled for good LH grip usage.  The fish scaling is the reason it appears dark.

At 25 yards, these guns are slightly more accurate than the related Hammerli 208 and 208S (which also is available).  At 50-75 yards, accuracy is a little less due to the 5" barrel length.

Maximum firing rate with practice, and with high precision, is approximately 5 rounds (or 5 separate targets) per second.

FFL transfer only.  Please note, FFL transfer only includes EVERYONE.

title: For Sale:  Spikes Tactical LW BAR 2 9" handguard free floating quad-rail
postcontent:
The Spike's Tactical LW BAR2- 9” Rail is a 1pc free floating quad-rail that’s machined from 6061-T6 Aluminum with a barrel nut machined from 7075-T6 Aluminum and finished in type III Hardcoat Anodizing on the rail and barrel nut. The main benefit of the BAR rail is to those who wish to have a suppressor inside of the rail or for those shooters who have large bear paw hands and who feel that skinnier rails are just too small ( the BAR is about the same circumference as a DD rail with the popular Magpul XTM covers). 

Inside dimensions 1.80" Outside dimensions Picatinny to picatinny 2.42" 

The BAR rail also features scalloping on the rails that not only saves a little bit more weight but also allows you to run this rail without any rail covers! This sounds like an outlandish claim to those who have had their hands cut up on other quad-rails that have been lovingly called “cheese graters”. The BAR also offers excellent heat ventilation, built in anti-rotation tabs to keep the rail and even the barrel nut from coming loose, and of course; sexy styling. 

No Spider logo on this one. Handguard only, no barrel nut or screws, fits the Seekins upper. or you can buy the barrel nut & screws from there website.

http://www.seekinsprecision.com/parts-and-accessories/handguards.html

http://www.spikestactical.com/rail-spikes-lw-bar2-9-p-1041.html

title: For Sale:  Faxon Arak 21 in .300 Blackout with upper receiver being blue
postcontent:
The ARAK-21® is a gas piston actuated, complete upper receiver assembly designed to seamlessly interface with the standard AR-15 platform.  The total extent of the interface is simply the take down pin, and the pivot pin.  The new ARAK-21® upper receiver offers you all its features with no change to your current lower receiver and can be installed in less than one minute with no tools. 

The BAU is comprised of the barrel, gas block, muzzle brake, gas piston, gas adjuster, and barrel trunnion.  The only removable part of this assembly is the gas adjuster knob.  The gas adjuster knob has 4 settings.  Three of the settings allow different gas flows for optimum operation, and one setting blocks the gas flow for a single shot operation.

The upper receiver includes the charging block, standard charging handle, lower forearm with screws, three aluminum full length picatinny rails, three insulating shims, bolt carrier assembly, lower recoil lug with spring guide rod, and dual recoil spring system.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Beretta 92F with Laser Max
location: NE Of Elkhart, South Bend, Indiana
postcontent:
Very nice condition Beretta 92F. VERY reliable, smooth as butter Beretta. Love this sidearm, but have too many so this one is being cut. I just don't carry it as often as I do the others. This gun has never had any issues, failure to feed or any other failures. I have dumped mags as quick as I could pull the trigger trying to get even a stovepipe, and nope. It just rocks it. Very smooth action. This Beretta has had trigger work done to polish and lighten the pull. It also has an internal LMS-1000 LaserMax laser sight. The LaserMax was a $300 upgrade on it's own. What can I say about a Beretta 92? They are reknown world wide for rock solid reliability. Cash price is firm. I "might" consider trades. 

This comes with original case, houge & original grips, two original Beretta 15 round mags, paperwork, as well as laser box, and paperwork & original parts the laser replaces, & Bull Dog holster.

I will consider selling the Beretta without the laser sight for $500. 

Will meet at FFL in Elkhart for state to state transfer. Beretta is registered in the state of Michigan.

title: For Sale:  CVA Optima Muzzle loader (used)
postcontent:
For sale is my CVA Optima 50cal muzzle loader.  It has a Bergera SS barrel and with Hornady PBF 350gr bullets it will shoot a 1" to 1 1/2" group at 100yards.  At 200yards it will easily hit a 12" steel plate.   

It has a fix 10power Bushnell Tactical scope with target turrets that retails for around $200.00.  This optic is mounted on a one piece rock solid scope mount.   

This Muzzle loader also has an upgraded vented breach plug.   These enables you to shoot Blackhorn 209 lose gunpowder.  This is by far the cleanest, fastest,  and most accurate powder made for Muzzle loaders. 

I have personally taken many deer with this rifle over the last 4 hunting seasons.  This a very dependable and accurate muzzle loader and the only reason I am selling it is I plan to use my crossbow and will no longer need it.  

There is some wear on this firearm particular on the stock that I would attribute to normal hunting use.  Over all the condition is very good. 

I am asking $425.00 with optics..

title: For Sale:  25-rd boxes Hornady Custom 9mm 147gr XTP
postcontent:
Just like the title says, I have several boxes of quality personal defense ammo. These are factory-loaded Hornady Custom 9mm 147gr XTP jacketed hollow point rounds in reloadable brass cases. Muzzle velocity is stated to be 975 fps. There are 25 rounds in each box.

Some free, unsolicited advice: If you have a 4" or 5" barrel, the Hornady Custom 147gr XTP will perform very well in terms of both penetration and expansion for a self defense application. If you have a shorter barrel, such as 3", you're better off going with the Hornady Critical Defense 115gr FTX to achieve optimum penetration and expansion for a self defense application. If you need/desire additional barrier penetration capabilities from any barrel length, such as passing through auto glass or walls, the Hornady Critical Duty 135gr FTX is an excellent choice.

Cost is $19/box all in...no sales tax or shipping costs! If you buy 4 boxes or more, cost is $18/box. Must meet in Lynnwood. Cash only, no trades.

title: For Sale:  A. UBERTI 1873 Regulator Grip Assembly
postcontent:
I've got a grip frame assembly for an A. Uberti 1873 Regulator.

What you get:  Trigger guard, back strap, original screws, and wooden grips.

The metal frame pieces are _brass_, not steel.  Depending on which shooting circuit you compete in, this may or may not be a problem.  Brass frames are not legal for National Congress of Old West Shooters (NCOWS) shooting, but they are legal for Single Action Shooters Society (SASS).

NOTE:  The owner previous of myself tried to modify the back strap by drilling/tapping a _small_ 1/8" hole immediately above where the hammer spring contacts the hammer.  This has not changed the functionality of the pistol in any way and is largely a cosmetic defect, and I am selling this grip hardware because the brass frame is not legal for the NCOWS circuit that I compete in.  The price does take into consideration the fact that his is used hardware with a "bubba" modification.

If you can find any of these pieces of the frame assembly cheaper than $50.00 dollars individually then I encourage you to go buy those ones, but if you want a complete grip frame assembly with a minor blemish then you can't beat this deal.

Will send pictures on request.
